author: National Bureau
text:
U.S. Ambassador to India Richard Verma on Thursday met senior BJP leader L.K. Advani here, the first meeting between the two since Mr. Verma took charge.

The two, sources said, discussed the threat of terrorism and the need for global unity in the fight against the menace. Mr. Advani is believed to have emphasised the need for a fight against terror for peace to prevail across the world.
title: U.S. envoy calls on Advani
